title: How to Make a Graham Cracker Pie Crust

steps.headline: Get a small bowl and mix the sugar and crackers together.
Pour in the butter and use a hand mixer to blend the ingredients together.
steps.description: If there's no hand blender available, you can whip the mixture by hand.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into a ungreased, 9 inch (22.9 cm) pie pan or plate and mold it all around the sides and bottom.
Prepare the crust in two ways:
